summary:
Dremora Follower Elda for your travells
Компаньон-дремора Элда
descriptionHtml:
DISCLAIMER
*THIS IS NOT MY MOD. I DID NOT CREATE IT. ALL THANKS AND CREDITS TO THE ORIGINAL AUTHOR*

This is the most beautiful dremora follower I've ever seen here on Nexus. Unfortunately, mod author for some reason hide the file, so nobody else can have fun with it. It is impossible to connect with him/her for the permissions, the author is just gone. I mostly did this for myself, so I can freely download this mod from one PC to another. That's why this is a Russian version, but I can do English translation if enough people ask (she will speak your game's language, only her name is in Russian, actually). I also did some fixes to dremora behaviour so she would behave more "naturally" (for example, look at player character when talking). Her tattoo I can't fix, though I tried.

You can find her in Riften. She uses some standard daedric magic and one-handed weapon.

UNPB MaikCG Daedric Armour is HIGHLY recommended for her: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58774/? Other than that, she is completely stand-alone (latest Skyrim version is needed). Usual installation adding contents to the Data folder.
author: Unknown
